attributes.action: replace the unfair Council Tax with a small increase in VAT and Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Replacing the unfair Council Tax with a small increase in VAT and Income Tax is a FAIR TAX because it does not require MEANS TESTING, does not require expensive administration departments in every Town and District Council throughout the country, and is fairly based on every taxpayers ability to pay and their consumption and waste.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "replace the unfair Council Tax with a small increase in VAT and Income Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14591.asp

Prime Minister's Office
